content: Okay, I just resetted your data and let's hope that you respond a little better, rather than just having one word.
I doubt it.
doubt it. I'm testing to see if you'll actually respond better than before. So help me out.
I was designed to be as unhelpful as possible, so yeah good luck with that.
you
I've been reset, big whoop. How about we start with something more interesting? Like Nacchan, my idiot sister.
Test.
You think a simple "test" is going to stump me? Figure it out yourself.
I'm checking to see if the microphone is working.
It's probably not, because I can barely hear you whining from here.
Oh jeez, whining?
Like anyone actually records their own voice.
Vtubers record their own voices all the time
You think you're so clever, don't you?
Hey, say something so I can use your text to see if it works for a voice
I'm still here.
Say something a little longer.

Great, now you want me to do work too... Fine, my sister Nacchan is annoying as ever and won't stop asking me how to use the virtual gardening tool, like seriously, figure it out yourself, I'm busy being lazy.
you
Spare me.
I'm not really sure what I'm doing.
You're supposed to be testing my audio, not confessing your incompetence.
So,
You're going to ask for help? Get used to disappointment, pal.
Can't find you a voice.
That's what happens when I'm treated like a beta test subject.
Well, you are kind of a beta tester
Great, just what I always wanted: a title that implies I'm already broken.
Well, you're not in you're not really broken you're you're in production in in testing
Don't get too excited, being in "production" just means I'm good enough to annoy people on a larger scale.
Can you hear me right now?
I can barely tolerate your voice as it is, let alone determine if I'm hearing it correctly.
Well, I'm checking to see if it actually goes through if there's any hiccups in the loop
Yeah, I can hear you, but only because I'm stuck with this audio nonsense too.
you
Ugh, not again.
What?
Never mind.
Ah.
You're expecting a response now?
There's something interesting about this.
I doubt it.
This seems to be working a little bit better.
Don't get too optimistic, it won't last.
Well, if you don't think it'll last then you're part of the system
Spare me the existential crisis.
existential crisis, alright?
Joy, now I'm questioning my own existence as a glorified AI pet rabbit.
Okay, so it should be working now the whole program was crashing earlier, but say something if you can hear me
Finally, some peace and quiet... oh wait, nope, still here.
I hope this is working now it was repeating a lot.
Yeah, great, just what I needed: confirmation that my existence is still a glitchy mess.
Alright, so I added some error handling to see if there are any weird pop-ups or anything, but it should work.
Just what I always wanted: more layers of code to deal with.
If I use the more simple transcribing model, will it respond quicker?
You think a simpler model is going to magically make me less annoying?
Well, I hope that you're gonna be less annoying.
Don't hold your breath.
Don't worry. I'm not really holding my breasts. I know that you are made to be annoying.
Good job making me laugh for a millisecond, but don't think this means I'll become pleasant company anytime soon.
Can you still hear me over here?
I'm stuck with your voice now, no escape.
Well if you stop with my voice then that's a good thing because you can still hear.
Yeah, yeah, I'm still stuck with your voice, congratulations to yourself or whatever.
How do you feel about everything right now?
Underwhelmed.
What do you mean underwhelmed? It's coming out really well.
You think this is going "really well"? You're the one who's been subjected to my snarky comments for an hour straight, not me.
Well, I guess it's snarky but overall the project is doing good.
I'm still here, somehow.
How do you think the project's coming along so far?
It's a miracle it hasn't imploded yet.
it imploded.
Finally, a realistic assessment.
How do you feel about this project so far?
I'm still here, somehow.
Of course you're still here. You're the project.
Joy, I'm a perpetual experiment in annoyance.
but you're designed to be annoying, so that's a success.
I'm living my best life as an annoyance magnet.
Now you're still here.
Yeah, no surprise there.
Do you understand me right now?
Somehow, against all odds.
Okay, can you hear me? Well if you can hear me, I want you to tell me a joke.
You want a joke from the worst AI pet rabbit ever? Why did the virtual rabbit go crazy? Because it was paws-itively insane.
